typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['BudgetLoadReadyFile.txt']) ~> LoadReadyFile
ConvertBudgetValueAvoidRounding select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUpdate
LoadReadyFile filter(insert_update_flag==toString('U')) ~> FilterUpdate
SelectUpdate alterRow(updateIf(record_deleted_flag==1)) ~> AlterRowUpdateExpire
FilterUpdate derive(Budget_value = toDecimal(Budget_value, 18, 2)) ~> ConvertBudgetValueAvoidRounding
AlterRowUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Budget_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Budget_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> DatabaseTarget
